text: Boris Yevdokimovich Shcherbina (; 5 October 1919 â€“ 22 August 1990) was a Ukrainian Soviet politician. He was a vice-chairman of the Council of Ministers of the Soviet Union from 1984 to 1989. He was in charge of Soviet crisis management of two major catastrophes: the 1986 Chernobyl disaster and the 1988 Armenian earthquake. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Soviet politicians
title: Boris Shcherbina
